import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update ticket tags"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Bulk updates the tags on a ticket by replacing the current tag set with the provided list. Tags enable flexible categorization and filtering beyond the standard issue type hierarchy, supporting custom workflows and reporting needs.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **Tag objects** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-query) to retrieve available tags with their `TagId` values.

**Workflow Example**
1. Locate ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. Get current tags: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) → note existing tags array
3. List available tags: [GET /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-query) → identify tags to add
4. Update tags: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/tags](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-tags) with complete tag array
5. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to confirm tag changes

**Request Body**: Array of `Tag` objects including `TagId` for each tag to apply. Empty array removes all tags.

**Note**: This is a replacement operation, not additive. Include all desired tags in the request.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/tags/\{tagId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-tag) – Add single tag
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/tags/\{tagId\}](/docs/api/tickets/remove-ticket-tag) – Remove single tag
- [GET /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-query) – List available tags

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Array of tags to apply to the ticket","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"TagId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Tag name"},"TagTypeId":{"type":"integer"},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean"},"Scope":{"type":"string"}},"required":["TagId","Name","TagTypeId","IsDeleted","Scope"],"title":"Tag"}},"example":[{"TagId":"eef8c511-66c0-45b8-9dd8-5a3a6adbe602","Name":"Loaner Cart","TagTypeId":1,"IsDeleted":false,"Scope":"Site"},{"TagId":"f1234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef","Name":"Urgent","TagTypeId":1,"IsDeleted":false,"Scope":"Site"}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
